AT.name: Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™ – Dual Destinies
AT.description: In Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™ - Dual Destinies kehrt der Held des Gerichtssaals Phoenix Wright zurück. Das viel geliebte Gameplay und die populären Features aus früheren Titeln der Ace Attorney™-Reihe sind zurück, doch zum ersten Mal mit beeindruckenden 3-D-Grafiken, die den Gerichtssaal und die Charaktere zum Leben erwecken und die Spieler mitten ins Geschehen transportieren. 1. Apollo Justice und die neue Rechtsanwaltskollegin und Expertin für Psychoanalyse Athena Sykes stoßen zu Phoenix in die Agentur Wright Anything und versprechen mehr Dramatik im Gerichtssaal 2. Psychoanalysieren Sie Zeugen mithilfe der brandneuen „Stimmungsmatrix“-Funktion, um die Wahrheit aufzudecken 3. Moment mal! Legen Sie Ihre Beweise vor, stellen Sie die Glaubwürdigkeit der Zeugen infrage und erleben Sie die Welt durch die Augen eines echten Rechtsanwalts 4. Beeindruckende, dynamische 3-D-Grafiken: Erwecken Sie die Charaktere und den Gerichtssaal zum Leben und untersuchen Sie Tatorte aus mehreren Perspektiven, um verborgene Hinweise zu entdecken 5. Brandneue Benutzeroberfläche und neues Spielverlaufsystem für Fans und neue Spieler

AU.name: Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™ – Dual Destinies
AU.description: Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™ - Dual Destinies sees the return of courtroom hero Phoenix Wright. The much loved gameplay and features from previous titles in the Ace Attorney™ series are back but for the first time in stunning 3D graphics, bringing the courtroom and characters to life and putting players directly in the heart of the action. 1. More courtroom drama as Apollo Justice and new Associate Attorney and psychoanalysis expert Athena Sykes join Phoenix at the Wright Anything Agency 2. Psychoanalyse witnesses to reveal the truth with the brand new Mood Matrix feature 3. Hold it! Present your evidence, challenge the witnesses and experience life as a real Attorney 4. Stunning dynamic 3D graphics: bring the characters and courtroom to life and investigate crime scenes from various angles to uncover hidden clues 5. Brand new interface and game progression system for fans and newcomers alike

BG.name: Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™ – Dual Destinies

Psychoanalyse witnesses to reveal the truth with the brand new Mood Matrix feature 3. Hold it! Present your evidence, challenge the witnesses and experience life as a real Attorney 4. Stunning dynamic 3D graphics: bring the characters and courtroom to life and investigate crime scenes from various angles to uncover hidden clues 5. Brand new interface and game progression system for fans and newcomers alike

BE.name: Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™ – Dual Destinies
BE.description: Le héros des tribunaux Phoenix Wright fait son grand retour dans Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™ - Dual Destinies. Vous y retrouverez le gameplay et les fonctionnalités qui ont fait le succès des précédents opus, servis pour la première fois par de magnifiques graphismes 3D permettant de donner vie à la cour et aux personnages pour une immersion inégalée. Plongez au cœur de l'action ! 1. Explorez davantage les arcanes de la justice avec l'arrivée au sein de l'Agence à tout faire Wright d'Apollo Justice et de la nouvelle avocate associée et experte en psychanalyse Athena Sykes. 2. Psychanalysez les témoins afin de dévoiler la vérité grâce à la toute nouvelle Matrice comportementale. 3. Objection ! Présentez vos preuves, confrontez les témoins et entrez dans la peau d'un véritable avocat. 4. De magnifiques graphismes 3D dynamiques : donnez vie aux personnages et au tribunal et examinez des scènes de crime sous tous les angles pour y découvrir des indices cachés. 5. Une toute nouvelle interface et un système de progression remanié qui raviront les fans de la série comme les débutants.

ES.name: Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™ – Dual Destinies
ES.description: En Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™ - Dual Destinies regresa el héroe de los juzgados, Phoenix Wright. También están de vuelta el popular sistema de juego y las características de los juegos anteriores de la serie Ace Attorney™, pero por primera vez podrás disfrutar de impresionantes gráficos en 3D, que le dan vida al juzgado y a los personajes y te meten de lleno en la acción. 1. Más drama en los juzgados con la incorporación de Apollo Justice y un nuevo abogado asociado, así como la experta en psicoanálisis Athena Sykes, al bufete Wright Anything, donde deberán trabajar con Phoenix. 2. Psicoanaliza a los testigos para revelar la verdad con la nueva Matriz de ánimo. 3. ¡Un momento, su Señoría! Presenta las pruebas, cuestiona a los testigos y métete en la piel de un abogado. 4. Impresionantes gráficos dinámicos en 3D: da vida al juzgado y a los personajes e investiga escenarios del crimen desde varios ángulos para descubrir pistas ocultas. 5. Nueva interfaz y sistema de progresión del juego, que se adapta a jugadores tanto novatos como expertos.

IT.name: Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™ – Dual Destinies
IT.description: Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™ - Dual Destinies vede il ritorno dell'eroe delle aule giudiziarie Phoenix Wright. Oltre alle acclamate funzionalità e dinamiche di gioco che già caratterizzavano i precedenti episodi della serie Ace Attorney™, questo nuovo titolo vanta anche una spettacolare grafica 3D che consentirà ai giocatori di tuffarsi nel cuore dell'azione insieme ai diversi personaggi che popolano le aule di tribunale. 1. Nuove vicende giudiziarie in cui Apollo Justice e la nuova collaboratrice e psicanalista Athena Sykes approdano alla Wright Anything Agency di Phoenix 2. Psicoanalizza i testimoni per scoprire la verità grazie alla nuova funzionalità Mood Matrix 3. Obiezione! Presenta le tue prove, metti alle strette i testimoni e vivi la vita di un vero avvocato 4. Favolosa grafica 3D: entra in aula, dai vita ai personaggi ed esamina le scene dei crimini da angolature diverse per scoprire indizi nascosti 5. Nuove dinamiche di avanzamento nel gioco e interfaccia completamente ridisegnata per un'esperienza ideale sia per i fan che per i meno esperti

NL.name: Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™ – Dual Destinies
NL.description: In Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™ - Dual Destinies keert onze held Phoenix Wright terug in de rechtszaal. De zo geliefde gameplay en mogelijkheden uit de vorige titels in de Ace Attorney™-serie zijn weer aanwezig, maar nu voor het eerst in verbluffende 3D-graphics. Ze brengen de rechtszaal en personages tot leven en plaatsen de spelers midden in de actie. 1. Apollo Justice en de nieuwe junior-advocaat Athena Sykes, een expert op het gebied van de psychoanalyse, gaan met Phoenix samenwerken bij de Wright Anything Agency 2. Onderwerp getuigen aan een psychoanalytisch onderzoek met behulp van de nieuwe Mood Matrix-functie 3. Presenteer de bewijzen, ondervraag de getuigen indringend en kom erachter wat het leven van een echte advocaat precies inhoudt 4. Verbluffend dynamische 3D-graphics: breng de personages en de rechtszaal tot leven en onderzoek de plaatsen delict vanuit verschillende gezichtshoeken om verborgen aanwijzingen te vinden 5. Splinternieuw voortgangssysteem en interface, voor zowel doorgewinterde fans als spelers die net kennismaken met de serie

NZ.name: Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™ – Dual Destinies
NZ.description: Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™ - Dual Destinies sees the return of courtroom hero Phoenix Wright. The much loved gameplay and features from previous titles in the Ace Attorney™ series are back but for the first time in stunning 3D graphics, bringing the courtroom and characters to life and putting players directly in the heart of the action. 1. PT.name: Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™ – Dual Destinies
PT.description: Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™ - Dual Destinies assiste ao regresso do herói das salas de tribunal, Phoenix Wright. A tão apreciada jogabilidade e as funcionalidades de títulos anteriores da série Ace Attorney™ estão de volta mas, pela primeira vez, com impressionantes gráficos a 3D, dando vida à sala de tribunal e às personagens, e posicionando os jogadores diretamente no coração da ação. 1. Mais drama na sala de tribunal quando Apollo Justice e a nova sócia e perita em psicanálise, Athena Sykes, se juntam a Phoenix na Wright Anything Agency 2. Psicanalisa as testemunhas para descobrires a verdade com a novíssima funcionalidade Mood Matrix (matriz de estado de espírito) 3. Para tudo! Apresenta as tuas provas, desafia as testemunhas e experimenta a vida de um advogado real 4. Gráficos a 3D impressionantes e dinâmicos: dá vida às personagens e à sala de tribunal, e investiga cenas de crime a partir de vários ângulos para descobrires pistas escondidas 5. Novíssima interface e sistema de progressão no jogo, tanto para os fãs como para os mais inexperientes

RU.name: Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™ – Dual Destinies
RU.description: Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™ - Dual Destinies возвращает в строй ветерана судебных сражений Phoenix Wright. Продолжение Ace Attorney™ сохранило любимые фанатами черты серии, теперь оформленные в роскошной трехмерной графике, которая оживляет залы суда и их обитателей и переносит игроков в самую гущу яростных дебатов. 1. Еще больше судебных страстей, в которых помимо Phoenix участвуют новые сотрудники Wright Anything Agency - Apollo Justice и новый ассистент и эксперт по психоанализу Athena Sykes 2. Проводите психоанализ свидетелей при помощи новой системы Mood Matrix, чтобы установить истину 3. Протестую! Представляйте доказательства, оспаривается показания свидетелей - живите жизнью настоящего адвоката 4. Потрясающая динамичная трехмерная графика: зал суда и персонажи выглядят как настоящие, а место преступления можно изучать с разных сторон, высматривая улики. 5. Новый интерфейс и система продвижения по игре придутся по нраву и новичкам, и фанатам серии

RO.name: Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™ – Dual Destinies
RO.description: Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™ - Dual Destinies sees the return of courtroom hero Phoenix Wright. The much loved gameplay and features from previous titles in the Ace Attorney™ series are back but for the first time in stunning 3D graphics, bringing the courtroom and characters to life and putting players directly in the heart of the action. 1. More courtroom drama as Apollo Justice and new Associate Attorney and psychoanalysis expert Athena Sykes join Phoenix at the Wright Anything Agency 2. Psychoanalyse witnesses to reveal the truth with the brand new Mood Matrix feature 3. Hold it! Present your evidence, challenge the witnesses and experience life as a real Attorney 4. Stunning dynamic 3D graphics: bring the characters and courtroom to life and investigate crime scenes from various angles to uncover hidden clues 5. Brand new interface and game progression system for fans and newcomers alike
